analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xc398fb8a6c71a7b130043bf5a3f05d9d51c2cac8.sol:
	Contract CHAD has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xc398fb8a6c71a7b130043bf5a3f05d9d51c2cac8.sol#211)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xc398fb8a6c71a7b130043bf5a3f05d9d51c2cac8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0xc398fb8a6c71a7b130043bf5a3f05d9d51c2cac8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xc398fb8a6c71a7b130043bf5a3f05d9d51c2cac8.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
